alert.note: Alert for Piscataquis (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued December 25 at 8:32PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR A DAM FLOODGATE RELEASE NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...River flooding caused by upstream dam floodgate release continues * WHERE...A portion of North Central Maine, including the following county, Piscataquis. * WHEN...Until 1100 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying areas near the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 830 PM EST, an upstream floodgate release at the Ripogenus Dam is expected to cause minor flooding in the Abol Bridge Campground and along the Appalachian Trail north of Abol Bridge. - Minor flooding is ongoing along the Appalachian Trail at the southern end of Baxter State Park as well as near the ATV kiosk at the Abol Bridge. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Baxter State Park and Abol Bridge. - Discharge at the Ripogenus Dam is approximately 9974 cfs - For flood safety http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Flooding is occurring or is imminent. It is important to know where you are relative to streams, rivers, or creeks which can become killers in heavy rains. Campers and hikers should avoid streams or creeks.
